Title: Golar LNG issues notice to proceed to Black & Veatch, CIMC Raffles on new FLNG conversion
Description: Floating LNG solutions player Golar LNG has issued a full notice to proceed for its MK II floating LNG conversion project to engineering firm Black & Veatch working as a sub-contractor to Yantai CIMC Offshore shipyard.
Author: JS

Title: Toscana LNG’s FSRU completes seven-month maintenance, to receive cargo in late-November
Description: Italy’s terminal operator OLT Offshore LNG Toscana expects its 2.8 mtpa Toscana LNG terminal to resume operations and receive the first LNG cargo in late November following the completion of seven months of planned maintenance.
Author: JS

Title: Gastrade begins commercial operations of Alexandroupolis LNG
Description: Gastrade has started commercial operations of the 4 mtpa Alexandroupolis floating LNG terminal, Greece’s second LNG import facility, which is expected to boost the energy security of Southeast and South Europe.
Author: JS

Title: US LNG exports stay flat in September versus August, shrugging off planned maintenance
Description: US LNG exports held steady in September against August but rose against year-earlier levels despite a precautionary halt in feed gas flows to a few plants ahead of Hurricane Francine’s landfall early in the month and scheduled maintenance at a few others.
Author: CK

Title: Switzerland’s MET Group partners Celsius to build one LNG ship for delivery in 2027
Description: Switzerland-based energy trader MET Group has signed a partnership deal with LNG shipowner and operator Celsius to build the Group’s first LNG vessel, with its delivery scheduled for 2027.
Author: CK
